lead_paragraph: Led by Juan Martin del Potro, Argentina is bidding to end its long pursuit of the Davis Cup title when it faces Croatia in the final this weekend.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Leads Argentina's Chase of 1st Davis Cup Title
headline.main: Del Potro Leads Argentina's Chase of 1st Davis Cup Title

snippet: Led by Juan Martin del Potro, Argentina is bidding to end its long pursuit of the Davis Cup title when it faces Croatia in the final this weekend....
